thread.title: Shannen Doherty Completes Cancer Treatment: 'The Waiting Game is Here'
thread.title_full: Shannen Doherty Completes Cancer Treatment: 'The Waiting Game is Here'

author: Just Jared
title: Shannen Doherty Completes Cancer Treatment: 'The Waiting Game is Here'
text:
Shannen Doherty is all done with her six straight weeks of chemotherapy!
The 45-year-old Charmed actress was diagnosed with breast cancer back in March 2015, and she took to Instagram on Friday (February 24) to update fans on her journey.
â€œ#Fbf to this morning,â€ she captioned a photo of herself laying in bed (below). â€œOct7,2016â€¦ not that long ago. Last day of chemo. Exhausted.â€ 
â€œNow that Iâ€™m done with chemo and radiation, the waiting game is here,â€ Shannen went on. â€œWaiting for test. Waiting to see if Iâ€™m clear or not. Waiting for reconstruction. Waiting.â€ 
â€œI think when one gets cancer, they are always waiting to a certain extent,â€ she added. â€œTo those who knowâ€¦ Iâ€™m waiting with you. #cancerslayer ğŸ€.â€
If the tests reveal that Shannen is cancer cell-free, she will be able to receive breast reconstruction surgery.
Weâ€™re wishing her all the best!
A post shared by ShannenDoherty (@theshando) on Feb 24, 2017 at 8:47am PST
